New Records: Chris Jordan became the first Englishman to claim a hat trick in T20 internationals
Key Match Events: England crushed the United States by 10 wickets with 62 balls remaining
Chris Jordan got a hat trick and the American cricket team lost five wickets in six balls
Post-Match Reflections: The Americans’ fairy-tale World Cup debut, which included a historic victory against heavyweight Pakistan earlier in the tournament, ended with three straight Super Eight losses
Miscellaneous Highlights: England secured its spot in the semifinals of the Twenty20 World Cup
South Africa must avoid defeat against tournament co-host West Indies in Sunday’s other game to qualify with England for the semifinals
Others: Chris Jordan finished with 4-10 in 2.5 overs
Captain Jos Buttler then smashed 83 not out off 38 balls
